General.Name: Qinghai Spring Medicinal Resources Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Qinghai Spring Medicinal Resources Technology Co., Ltd. research and development, production, and sale of cordyceps products. It is also involved in the sale of beverages and aquatic products; advertising; and foreign investment business. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Xining, China.
General.Address: Xining Eco and Techn Dev Zone, Xining, China, 810007
